name: Sokopango
description:
Take the challenge - get out of the dungeon!

Enemies will surround you, but you are strong and agile!

Crush, smash, blast enemies.

Ooo ha ha ha ha!

Forward.

Control:

                                    Action                                         KeyLeft"Left arrow" or "A"Right"Right arrow' or "D"Up"Up arrow" or "W"Down"Down arrow" or "S"Kick/push block"Space"StopRight "Ctrl" of Left "Ctrl"
